thread.section_title: UsedLighting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UsedLighting.com | www.usedlighting.com
thread.title: Alan Haggard

author: Alan Haggard
title: Alan Haggard
text: I ordered a pair of ip-rated sixpars, knowing they were demo units. Everything was as described, they went up and on just as well as the new ones I already had. The Only issue I had was that the dmx lines weren't ip-rated-they had been converted to 5-pin. So the 3-pin pigtails that came with the unit were not functional for me. This worked out because my rig is 5-pin. All in all, a great experience, and I'll order again.
